text:
Hi there <@U01E4DUKW12>, i'm about 2 years late to this thread but hopefully this can help you. I agree that there isn't much documentation/guides on how us devs can achieve what you're asking, but here's how I achieve this:

`{% dnd_module path="../module/CTA Block"`  
  `label = 'CTA Block',`
  `title = 'a title',` 
  `description = 'a description',` 
  `step = [`
    `{`
      `title : "Title One",`
      `description : "Lorem ipsum"`
    `},`
    `{`
      `title : "Title Two",`
      `description : "Lorem ipsum"`
    `}`
  `]`
  `%}`
`{% end_dnd_module %}`
